 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּתֵף‎</span> **noun feminine**<sup>[[Exod.27.15|Exod 27:15]]</sup> ==shoulder, shoulder-blade, side== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎כַּתְפָּא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); — absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כ‎</span> [[Zech.7.11|Zech 7:11]] +; construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כֶּתֶף‎</span> [[1Kgs.6.8|1Kgs 6:8]] +, app. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּתֵף‎</span> [[Isa.11.14|Isa 11:14]] (but regard as apposition, or read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כֶּתֶף‎</span>); suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּתֵפִי‎</span> [[Job.31.22|Job 31:22]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּתֵפָם‎</span> [[1Chr.15.15|1Chr 15:15]] plural absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּתֵפֹת‎</span> [[Exod.28.7|Exod 28:7]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּתֵפוֺת‎</span> [[1Kgs.7.30|1Kgs 7:30]]; [[1Kgs.7.34|1Kgs 7:34]] construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כִּתְפֹת‎</span> [[Exod.28.12|Exod 28:12]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כִּתְפוֺת‎</span> [[Ezek.41.2|Ezek 41:2]] +; dual suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כִּתֵפָיו‎</span> [[Deut.33.12|Deut 33:12]] + 3 t., <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּתֵפֶיהָ‎</span> [[1Kgs.7.34|1Kgs 7:34]] — 

**1. a.** ==of man==, ***shoulder, shoulder-blade*** (while  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁכֶם‎</span>, q. v. = ***neck and shoulders***), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּידוֺן נְחשֶׁת בֵּין כְּתֵפָיו‎</span> [[1Sam.17.6|1Sam 17:6]] compare figurative of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>'s dwelling ***between the shoulders*** of Benjamin [[Deut.33.12|Deut 33:12]] (see [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּתֵפִי מִשִּׁכְמָה תִפּוֺל‎</span> [[Job.31.22|Job 31:22]] ***my shoulder-blade, from the shoulder let it fall***; as support for burdens [[Judg.16.3|Judg 16:3]]; [[Ezek.12.6|Ezek 12:6]]; [[Ezek.12.7|Ezek 12:7]]; [[Ezek.12.12|Ezek 12:12]]; [[Isa.46.7|Isa 46:7]]; [[Isa.49.22|Isa 49:22]] (in figurative), [[Exod.28.12|Exod 28:12]]; [[Num.7.9|Num 7:9]] (both [[BDB#P|P]]), [[1Chr.15.15|1Chr 15:15]]; [[2Chr.35.3|2Chr 35:3]] compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְרוּטָה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּלכֿ‎</span> [[Ezek.29.18|Ezek 29:18]] ***every shoulder was rubbed bare*** (of Nebuchadnezzar's soldiers chafed by armour and toil); as aim of bird of prey [[Isa.11.14|Isa 11:14]] (figurative); compare ***shoulder of Moab*** [[Ezek.25.9|Ezek 25:9]] (figurative, i.e. the side of M. exposed to invasion): [[Ezek.29.7|Ezek 29:7]]b read probably <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כַּף‎</span> ([[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]]. [[BDB#Syr|ᵑ6]] [[BDB#Sm|Sm]] [[BDB#Co|Co]], compare v<sup>a</sup>). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** of beasts, [[Isa.30.6|Isa 30:6]] (carrying), [[Ezek.34.21|Ezek 34:21]] (thrusting, in figure), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סֹרָ֑רֶת‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כ‎</span> [[Zech.7.11|Zech 7:11]] ***a refractory shoulder*** (refusing the yoke, figurative), so [[Neh.9.29|Neh 9:29]] of choice meat [[Ezek.24.4|Ezek 24:4]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָרֵךְ‎</span>). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** = ***shoulder-pieces*** (always plural) of ephod [[Exod.28.7|Exod 28:7]]; [[Exod.28.12|Exod 28:12]]; [[Exod.28.25|Exod 28:25]]; [[Exod.28.27|Exod 28:27]] = [[Exod.39.4|Exod 39:4]]; [[Exod.39.7|Exod 39:7]]; [[Exod.39.18|Exod 39:18]]; [[Exod.39.20|Exod 39:20]] ([[BDB#P|P]]). 

**2. a.** ***slope side***, of mountain, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כֶּתֶף יָםכִּֿנֶּרֶת‎</span> [[Num.34.11|Num 34:11]], i.e. the mountain-slopes northeast of the lake, compare [[Josh.15.8|Josh 15:8]]; [[Josh.15.10|Josh 15:10]]; [[Josh.15.11|Josh 15:11]]; [[Josh.18.12|Josh 18:12]]; [[Josh.18.13|Josh 18:13]]; [[Josh.18.16|Josh 18:16]]; [[Josh.18.18|Josh 18:18]]; [[Josh.18.19|Josh 18:19]] (all [[BDB#P|P]]). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** ***opposite side (s)***, that is, of door or entrance, of tabernacle-court [[Exod.27.14|Exod 27:14]]; [[Exod.27.15|Exod 27:15]] = [[Exod.38.14|Exod 38:14]]; [[Exod.38.15|Exod 38:15]] (all [[BDB#P|P]]), of temple [[1Kgs.6.8|1Kgs 6:8]]; [[1Kgs.7.39|1Kgs 7:39]] (3 t. in verse) = [[2Chr.4.10|2Chr 4:10]]; [[2Kgs.11.11|2Kgs 11:11]] (twice in verse) = [[2Chr.23.10|2Chr 23:10]] (twice in verse); compare [[Ezek.40.18|Ezek 40:18]]; [[Ezek.40.40|Ezek 40:40]] (twice in verse); [[Ezek.40.41|Ezek 40:41]]; [[Ezek.40.44|Ezek 40:44]] (twice in verse); [[Ezek.41.2|Ezek 41:2]]; [[Ezek.41.26|Ezek 41:26]]; [[Ezek.46.19|Ezek 46:19]]; [[Ezek.47.1|Ezek 47:1]]; [[Ezek.47.2|Ezek 47:2]]. 

**3.** ***supports*** of the bases for the lavers beside the temple [[1Kgs.7.30|1Kgs 7:30]] (twice in verse); [[1Kgs.7.34|1Kgs 7:34]] (twice in verse).
